Artist - Song - Station
This is the main page of the Musical Structure app, with buttons for all the other activities that can be accessed inside the app.
This is the FM Radio screen, where users can find and listen to local FM Radio stations.
The screen contains an FM radio manual tuner with the found radio station name displayed and an add to favorites star toggle button.
This is the Internet Radio screen, where users can find and listen to Internet Radio stations.
The screen contains an EditText view for manually entering a radio station URL, and also a list of available internet radio stations.
This is the My Music screen, where users can see and play the music which is stored on the device.
The screen contains an EditText view for searching through files and a list of available music from the device.
This is the Favorites screen, where users can see their favorite songs from the device and also the local or internet radio stations they added.
The screen contains a list of songs, FM or internet radio stations listed in the order they were added to favorites by the user.
